languages.text: "Вы сами прибыли на нашу станцию — никто не звал вас. Сами же предстали передо мной и Дитя... И даже сговорились с изменником Фелеком. Отступать уже поздно, самое время решать, на чьей вы стороне".

traits.locale_text: "Вы сами прибыли на нашу станцию — никто не звал вас. Сами же предстали передо мной и Дитя... И даже сговорились с изменником Фелеком. Отступать уже поздно, самое время решать, на чьей вы стороне".

languages.text: "You came to our station of your own volition — no one summoned you here. You chose to come before me and the Child... and you even plotted with the traitor Felek. It is too late to retreat, now you must choose whose side you are on."
languages.original_text: "Вы сами прибыли на нашу станцию — никто не звал вас. Сами же предстали передо мной и Дитя... И даже сговорились с изменником Фелеком. Отступать уже поздно, самое время решать, на чьей вы стороне".

traits.locale_text: "You came to our station of your own volition — no one summoned you here. You chose to come before me and the Child... and you even plotted with the traitor Felek. It is too late to retreat, now you must choose whose side you are on."

"You came to our station of your own volition — no one summoned you here. You chose to come before me and the Child... and you even plotted with the traitor Felek. It is too late to retreat, now you must choose whose side you are on."

"You came to our station of your own volition — no one summoned you here. You chose to come before me and the Child... and you even plotted with the traitor Felek. It is too late to retreat, now you must choose whose side you are on."

"You came to our station of your own volition — no one summoned you here. You chose to come before me and the Child... and you even plotted with the traitor Felek. It is too late to retreat, now you must choose whose side you are on."

languages.text: “没人召唤你来到这里，你是自愿来到这座星站的。你选择来到我和圣子面前……你甚至与费雷克那个叛徒一起密谋。现在一走了之已经太晚了，你必须选择要站在哪一边。”
languages.original_text: "You came to our station of your own volition — no one summoned you here. You chose to come before me and the Child... and you even plotted with the traitor Felek. It is too late to retreat, now you must choose whose side you are on."

traits.locale_text: “没人召唤你来到这里，你是自愿来到这座星站的。你选择来到我和这孩子面前……你甚至与费雷克那个叛徒一起密谋。现在一走了之已经太晚了，你必须选择要站在哪一边。”

languages.text: «Vino a esta estación por voluntad propia; nadie solicitó su presencia. Decidió presentarse ante mí y la niña... e incluso conspiró con Felek, el traidor. Es demasiado tarde para retirarse. Debe elegir en qué bando está».
languages.original_text: "You came to our station of your own volition — no one summoned you here. You chose to come before me and the Child... and you even plotted with the traitor Felek. It is too late to retreat, now you must choose whose side you are on."

traits.locale_text: «Vino a esta estación por voluntad propia; nadie solicitó su presencia. Decidió presentarse ante mí y la niña... e incluso conspiró con Felek, el traidor. Es demasiado tarde para retirarse. Debe elegir en qué bando está».

languages.text: 「あなたは自分の意志で私たちのステーションに来たのだ…誰に呼ばれたわけでもない。あなたが私や『子ども』の前に来ることを選んだ…そして、裏切り者のフェレックと共謀すらもあなたの選択だ。退くには遅すぎる。今こそ、誰の側につくか選ばなければならない」
languages.original_text: "You came to our station of your own volition — no one summoned you here. You chose to come before me and the Child... and you even plotted with the traitor Felek. It is too late to retreat, now you must choose whose side you are on."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは自分の意志で私たちのステーションに来たのだ…誰に呼ばれたわけでもない。あなたが私や『子ども』の前に来ることを選んだ…そして、裏切り者のフェレックと共謀すらもあなたの選択だ。退くには遅すぎる。今こそ、誰の側につくか選ばなければならない」

languages.text: "Ihr seid aus freien Stücken auf unsere Station gekommen, niemand hat Euch herbestellt. Ihr habt entschieden, zu mir und dem Kind zu kommen ... und Ihr habt sogar mit dem Verräter Felek gemeinsame Sache gemacht. Es ist zu spät, um Euch zurückzuziehen. Nun müsst Ihr wählen, auf wessen Seite Ihr steht."
languages.original_text: "You came to our station of your own volition — no one summoned you here. You chose to come before me and the Child... and you even plotted with the traitor Felek. It is too late to retreat, now you must choose whose side you are on."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid aus freien Stücken auf unsere Station gekommen, niemand hat Euch herbestellt. Ihr habt entschieden, zu mir und dem Kind zu kommen ... und Ihr habt sogar mit dem Verräter Felek gemeinsame Sache gemacht. Es ist zu spät, um Euch zurückzuziehen. Nun müsst Ihr wählen, auf wessen Seite Ihr steht."

languages.text: « Vous êtes {mf|venu|venue} sur notre station de votre plein gré, personne ne vous a {mf|convoqué|convoquée}. Vous avez choisi de vous présenter devant l'Enfant et moi... vous avez même comploté avec le traître Felek. Il est trop tard pour battre en retraite, vous devez choisir votre camp. »
languages.original_text: "You came to our station of your own volition — no one summoned you here. You chose to come before me and the Child... and you even plotted with the traitor Felek. It is too late to retreat, now you must choose whose side you are on."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes {mf|venu|venue} sur notre station de votre plein gré, personne ne vous a {mf|convoqué|convoquée}. Vous avez choisi de vous présenter devant l'Enfant et moi... vous avez même comploté avec le traître Felek. Il est trop tard pour battre en retraite, vous devez choisir votre camp. »

languages.text: "İstasyonumuza kendi rızanla geldin, kimse seni çağırmadı. Benim ve Çocuk'un karşısına çıkmayı kendin seçtin, hatta hain Felek'le beraber kumpas bile düzenledin. Geri çekilmek için çok geç, hemen şu an tarafını seçmek zorundasın."
languages.original_text: "You came to our station of your own volition — no one summoned you here. You chose to come before me and the Child... and you even plotted with the traitor Felek. It is too late to retreat, now you must choose whose side you are on."

traits.locale_text: "İstasyonumuza kendi rızanla geldin, kimse seni çağırmadı. Benim ve Çocuk'un karşısına çıkmayı kendin seçtin, hatta hain Felek'le beraber kumpas bile düzenledin. Geri çekilmek için çok geç, hemen şu an tarafını seçmek zorundasın."
